MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH49 postcode area of Upton, affecting properties in Ford Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 05.08am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08.04am on 27th April 2021.
